column5: I was at the bank yesterday in Whitby and when I got out of the car I looked up and saw this....was pretty amazing and a bit scary to see!  I kept waiting for a funnel cloud to form!
cool pic  i'm a bit of a weather nerd. that appears to be a shelf cloud.. typically pretty harmless  if you see something like below (wall cloud), with hints of rotation, take cover
I hope you were at the bank getting $$$ for the steaks! LMAO! HH
Yep.  Have to finance them this time.   Lol
Wow!!  Great pic!!  cool pici'm a bit of a weather nerd. that appears to be a shelf cloud.. typically pretty harmlessif you see something like below (wall cloud), with hints of rotation, take cover
They are worth every penny YOU spend Cliff! LOL HH
